title: The Female Lead Introduced The Male Lead To Me - Novel Updates
tags: European Ambience   First Love   Love Triangles   Misunderstandings   Mob Protagonist   Possessive Characters   Revenge   Slow Growth at Start   Transmigration   Villainess Noble Girls
author: 하느
description:
She possessed a supporting role of a villain who fell in love with the male lead and harassed the female lead until she suffered and died.

She succeeded until he became best friends with the original female lead and avoided death!

But one day as I was finally happy, the female lead said she would introduce me to a man…

“Hello, Lady Bessia. I’ve heard a lot about you.”

“Yes? … Yes?”

The Male lead came to the blind date.

***

“Kachen and I, of course, have a business relationship.”

‘…Bella, he’s the male lead! Your future husband!’

The female lead who has to flirt with the man by now… you call it a business relationship with him, don’t you?

“I hate that you think of other people.”

‘…I hate you, Ventiane.’

Why is the sub male who thought he was cold-blooded?

“Bessia, how about dating me? Not fake, real.”

‘…Cahen?’

I’m sure I decided not to twist the original anymore,>
